text:
Hello. I'm trying to follow the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/hello-world-creating-your-first-react-graphql-custom-card-for-HubSpots-crm|React + Graph QL extension guide> on the dev blog. I'm stuck on step 2. When I run `hs project create` and choose the "getting started" template, I'm missing some files.

The article is saying my files should look like what's on the left, but mine look like the ones on the right. Specifically I'm missing the extensions folder. Anyone know why this might be happening?
<@U2H3TT8F2> you're the author listed on this article. Any advice?
You're probably not in the beta for react cards, you can self enroll in this beta by going to the product updates and then to betas then enrolling in the beta.

It's also possible that you have an old version of the CLI installed, to update it run this command:
```npm install -g @HubSpot/cli@latest```
